p: Individual analysis of chromosomal alterations revealed a significant number for the essential oils from both S. botocudorum and S. tupiniquinorum when compared to the negative controls. Most alterations were similar to or higher than the number found in cells treated with glyphosate (Fig.Â 4a, b). Lost chromosomes, adherent chromosomes, anaphase bridges, c-metaphases and delay in anaphase were observed.
